K12D0430_H0406:181b-32: kunda mgo la mchog tu brtson //

K12D0430_H0406:182a-1: bskyod; ;rang bzhin gyis ni sa sgra dang //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-2: bdud rtsi chu dang 'dres pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-3: de nyid 'di yis myang byas pa //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-4: rnal 'byor chos la rab tu shis //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-5: bden pa'i chos ni mchog tu bden //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-6: rnal 'byor chos ni rab tu bstod //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-7: de nyid dman pa'i rnam rtog yid //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-9: bye ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-10: gdan gzhi pa yi rgyud 'di nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-11: mkhas pa yis ni rnam bltas la //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-12: sbyor ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-13: sbyor ba'i chos kyis gtor ma sbyin //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-14: bdud rtsi lnga mdor bsdus le'u zhes bya ba lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0430_H0406:182a-15: 'byung ba'i dbugs kyi the tshom ni //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'dri //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-18: gang gis shes nas rab tu sbyar; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-19: 'gro ba lus can sems can don //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-20: 'chi bdag kun nas bslu ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-21: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje bdag /
K12D0430_H0406:182a-22: gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-23: 'chi bdag lus ni gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-24: dang por snga dro'i dus nyid la //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-25: dbugs ni rnam par dgod bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-26: lus can zla drug nas 'chi bar //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-27: ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-28: gal te dus la bab gyur na //
K12D0430_H0406:182a-30: de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong na //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-0: lus kyi @182b mtshan ma shes byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-1: rnal 'byor pa yis zhi bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-2: rna ba'i au da rnam chad na //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-3: chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-4: mig gi aam ba ra yi rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-5: tro ta de bzhin nyi ma lnga //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-6: sna yi ma si ka chad na; ;nyi ma bdun gyis gdon mi za //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-8: nyi ma gsum gyis the tshom med //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-9: 'di yi lce la thig nag na //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-10: zhag gnyis kyis 'chi lus can rnams //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-11: mgrin pa'i glo yi phyi rol rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-12: zla phyed las ni mi thub bo //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-13: brang gi lhe'u 'og zhom gyur na //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-14: zla phyed sman pas gso spyad yod //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-15: sen mo khrag ni med pa na //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-16: chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo /
K12D0430_H0406:182b-18: 'chi ba'i rma sogs rnam par spangs //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-19: rna ba'i au da'i bdag nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-20: rnal 'byor dbye bas bsten par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-21: mig gi aam ba ra chad na //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-22: mkhas pas dkar po'i sa bon bzla //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-23: sna yi ma si ka la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-24: dbugs bsdams me yi dud pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-25: so dang so 'thams rtsa la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-26: dung gi sa bon bzlas pas 'phrog /
K12D0430_H0406:182b-27: lce yi thig nag 'di la ni; ;bdag nyid sbyor bas mnan par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-28: mgrin pa glo yi phyi rol rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-29: padma'i sa bon gyis rtse bya //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-30: brang gi lhe'u zhom pa la //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-31: sgong skyes ye shes bsgom pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-32: sen mo khrag ni med pa la //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-33: lag pa bsdus la bzlas par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-34: bug pa dgu yi sgo ru ni //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-35: sa bon dgu yis rtse bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:182b-36: rtsa dgu la ni sa bon dgu /
K12D0430_H0406:182b-37: sgo dgu sa bon dgu yis bsdam //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-1: ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-3: ma bsregs snod ni gnyis gzung ste //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-4: gur gum dang ni gi wang gis //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-5: bcu gnyis tshad ni yang dag bri //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-6: sa bon dbyangs yig bskor bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-7: lha mo brgyad kyis sa bon 'di //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-8: mtshams su ma ning sa bon dang //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-9: dbus su ye shes sa bon ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-10: mkhas pa yis ni bskor bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-11: de bzhin ming ni dbus su bri //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-12: h'um gi dbus su gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-13: gnyi ga dang yang sbyar byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-14: skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-15: m'a ma k'i ni 'dab mar bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-16: steng du de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag /
K12D0430_H0406:183a-17: gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-18: nus pa yi ni mngon par mchod //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-20: rtse dang rtse ni sprad par bya; ;rnam shes ye shes sa bon ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-21: brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-22: rnam shes bsdams pa'i dngos po dang //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-23: rnal 'byor bsrung pa'i khyad par gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-24: yi dvags srin po 'byung po dang //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-25: dus ma yin par 'chi ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-26: rnal 'byor pa yis bsrungs tsam gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-27: grol bar 'di la the tshom med //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-28: tshe zad pa yi lus can ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183a-29: zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur; ;'chi ba'i mtshan
K12D0430_H0406:183a-30: ma yongs su brtag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba bya
K12D0430_H0406:183a-32: rnal 'byor bstan bcos cho ga'i rim //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-0: de nas ye shes dbang @183b gis bsrungs //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-1: 'khrig pa'i dngos po bsten pa las //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-3: ye shes ngo bos 'byung ba yi //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-4: 'byin pa'i rtsa ni mngon par sems //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-5: bdun par khu bar gyur pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-6: dkar po'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-7: khrag gis mtshan mo brgyad na ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-8: du ba'i rtsa ni mngon du gso //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-9: mtshan mo phyed dang bzhir bsnyen pas //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-10: dung gi rtsa ni byin gyis brlab; ;gong du mtshan mo bcu gnyis kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-11: padma'i rtsa ni rab tu sbyar //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-12: nyi ma drug cu'i grangs 'di yis //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-13: mkhas pas gi wang gi ni rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-14: mkhrang 'gyur dgu zhes bshad pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-15: dri med gsum gyi rtsa ni bskyed //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-16: mtshan mo bcu dang drug gi ro //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-17: 'byed pa'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-18: sa gdugs ye shes rnam shes ni //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-19: yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus can no //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-20: sa gdugs bcu dang brgyad nyid kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-21: mkhas pa zla dgur kun tu gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-22: skye ba skra bra la sogs ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-23: sen mo khog pa rus pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-24: zhag dang srin bu gci ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-25: bshad pa bad kan mchi ma sogs; ;brgyad ni mngal na nga rgyal ba //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-26: rtsa yi brgyad pa zhes bya la //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-27: lhag par lha dgu gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-28: bdag nyid lha dang pha rol mchod //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-29: bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-30: dkar po lha mo sgrol ma 'di //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-31: dud pa la ni gos dkar gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-32: lha mo sangs rgyas ngu nyid la //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-33: m'a ma k'i ni padmar gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-34: lha mo snyan ma gi wang la //
K12D0430_H0406:183b-35: rdo rje sgeg mo dri med la //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-2: sa yi gdugs la padma'i rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-3: 'di ltar spros pa'i ye shes rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-4: thams cad 'byin cing sdud pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-5: ji ltar rgyal po rnam snang mdzad //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-6: de ltar rgyab tu rab tu grags //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-7: mnyam pa'i cha ru de byas pas //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-8: mnyam pa'i gzugs ni 'od dang bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-9: stong phrag dgu yi grangs nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-10: re re las ni gyes pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-11: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-12: lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-13: dgu pa yis ni 'byin cing sdud //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-14: dgu yi rtsa ni rtag pa'i sa //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-15: dgu dang lnga yis dga' bar bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-17: gcig gis 'byin ci sdug pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-18: gcig gis lha ni ye shes can //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-20: gcig gi lus dang lus can dang //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-21: gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-22: mi stong pa dang stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-23: ring min thung min gzhan ma yin //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-24: dngos med dngos po tsam ma yin //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-25: kha dog med la tshon kun dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-26: ye shes lus can rnal 'byor pas; ;lam gnyis pa ni srid pa'i skyon //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-27: lam gcig pa yi rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-28: rnam par rtog pa kun spangs la //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-29: gcig gi lam nyid shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-30: shel ltar dag pa'i lus kyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-31: dag pa'i lam du yang dag bgrod //
K12D0430_H0406:184a-32: rtsa bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ba bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0430_H0406:184a-33: sbyor ba'i mdo ru bsdus pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-1: phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig /
K12D0430_H0406:184b-2: sbyor ba'i bstan bcos sgrub pa pos //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-3: gdan bzhi pa las btus pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-4: stong phrag bcu gnyis yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-5: de yi don ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-6: gzhung mang pa yis 'jigs pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-7: de nyid mdor bsdus pa yi tshig /
K12D0430_H0406:184b-8: sbyor ba'i rnams la nye bar gsungs //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-9: rnal 'byor pa la rab dgod pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-10: de nas zhi ba yang dag bshad //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-11: thog mar bya ba stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-12: stong pa'i dbus su padma ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-13: padma sa bon myu gu can //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-14: kha dog bdun pa rgya chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-15: sde tshan bzhi pa'i tshig la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-16: steng du ma ning thig ler bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-17: de yi sa bon mnyam bsgoms nas //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-18: de bzhin khro gnyer can ma bskyed //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-20: gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g-yogs //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-21: dag pa'i sku dang spyan gsum pa //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-22: phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-23: mchog sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-24: bgrang phreng ril ba spyi blugs bsnams //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-25: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-26: rab tu mdzes pa'i na bzar mnabs //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-27: bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-28: mkhas pa mchog gi yi ge gcig /
K12D0430_H0406:184b-29: khro gnyer mchog gi yi ge ni //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-30: 'bum phrag gcig zlos sngags pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-31: rnal 'byor pa yis brtsams tsam gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-32: tshe ni 'phel bar rab tu grags //
K12D0430_H0406:184b-33: lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-2: ti se gangs kyi rtse mo dang //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-3: gser gyi ri bo'i ngos dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-4: rin chen bdun rang bzhin gnas su //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-5: gzhal yas khang pa nyer mdzes pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-6: seng ge'i gdan la gnas pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-7: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-8: gdugs dkar po dang bla re dang //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-9: dril bu dra bas mngon par mdzes //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-10: bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung ste //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-11: gsum pa yis ni sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-12: sde tshan mtha' yis steng du 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-13: ye shes can gyis sa bon gcig /
K12D0430_H0406:185a-14: dbugs mi g-yo zhing 'od zer bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-15: ser po'i mdog tu rnam par bsgom //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-16: phyis ni nor rgyun zhes bya ba'i //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-17: lha mo'i gzugs su rnam par bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-18: phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-19: rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-20: kha dog 'bar bar bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-21: rin chen shing dang za ma tog /
K12D0430_H0406:185a-22: gnyis pa na ni rab tu 'phel //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-23: gsum pas mchod sbyin lag pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-24: steng du shes rab phyag dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-25: gnyis pa la ni bgrang phreng dang //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-26: gsum pa ril ba spyi blugs so //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-27: bsgom dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-28: dbugs ni 'dren pa'i khams nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-29: rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0430_H0406:185a-30: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-31: dmar po'i las kyi khyad par ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185a-32: sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-0: stong @185b pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs nas ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-1: stong par padma yang dag bshad //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-2: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten cing //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-3: gdugs dkar po yis mngon par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-4: dbyangs yig dang po'i yi ge gcig /
K12D0430_H0406:185b-5: steng du sde tshan tha ma dang //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-6: mnyam par gzhag pas sa bon dmar //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-8: sems can 'gugs par byed pa'i dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-9: lha mo'i gzugs brnyan 'di bsams la //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-10: btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bur //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-11: m'a ma k'i bsam yang dag 'byung //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-12: phyag gnyis rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-13: gcig gis lcags kyu yang dag 'dzin //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-14: g-yon pas dril bu mngon sgrogs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-15: thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-16: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-17: bsgom zhing bzlas pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-19: de nas nag po'i las 'di ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-20: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-21: rlung gi dbus su rlung gi ni //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-22: rlung gi sa bon bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-23: du ba du ba rab 'bar ba //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-24: sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-25: nag po drag po yi ni gdan //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-26: yi dvags gdan la kun gnas pa //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-27: bsam pa ral gcig ma yi gzugs //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-28: kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od; ;dbu skra gyen bardzes lha mo che //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-29: drag par rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-30: spyan gsum zhal ni gcig pa la //
K12D0430_H0406:185b-31: phyag bzhi yi ni rnam par spras //
K12D0430_H0406:186a-2: gnyis pa na ni rdo rje gser //
K12D0430_H0406:186a-3: g-yas na mdung ni 'dzin mdzad cing //
K12D0430_H0406:186a-4: gnyis par de bzhin sdigs mdzub bo //

K12D0430_H0406:203a-22: bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang //

K12D0430_H0406:203b-0: khyad par glu dang mchod pas me la mchod par bya ste sgras @203b 'jug par bya'o //

K12D0430_H0406:203b-2: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:203b-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-4: slar yang me yi brtag pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-6: dma' bar 'bar bas rgyas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-9: de bzhin me yi de nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-10: blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes byed //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-11: dbang ldan du ni zhi ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-12: shar du dpal dang mngon par 'grogs //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-13: me yi phyogs su rgyas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-14: lho phyogs su ni nor brlag go /
K12D0430_H0406:203b-15: bden bral 'chi ba'i pho nya nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-16: nub tu dbang ni brtsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-17: rlung du nor ni nyams pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-18: byang du rigs ni rnam par 'phel //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-19: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:203b-20: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

K12D0430_H0406:203b-22: yam shing gi ni bye brag nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:203b-23: zhi ba la ni sor mo bcu //

K12D0430_H0406:203b-29: yam shing 'di ni cho ga'i mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:203b-30: thang shing de bzhin shing dang ni //

K12D0430_H0406:204a-4: 'o mar ldan pa'i btung ba dang //

K12D0430_H0406:204a-10: punda r'i ka gur gum dang //
K12D0430_H0406:204a-11: aa ru ra yi me tog brgya //

K12D0430_H0406:204a-17: le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:204a-18: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba; ;'byung po gnod sbyin de bzhin klu //

K12D0430_H0406:204a-32: byang du 'khor byed gnod sbyin no //

K12D0430_H0406:204b-7: rtsi'i ro bzhin sbyor ba mkhas pas mi shes so
K12D0430_H0406:204b-8: // lce la de bzhin dkar po'i sa bon de ni dud pa'i lcags kyus drangs //

K12D0430_H0406:204b-13: rlung gis 'byin cing yid ni mngon nga rgyal //
K12D0430_H0406:204b-14: rlung gi sa bon gyis ni rtag sbyor byed //

K12D0430_H0406:204b-23: chu shing me tog lta bu ni //

K12D0430_H0406:204b-25: de dbus de bzhin gsungs pa ni //

K12D0430_H0406:205a-2: de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed //

K12D0430_H0406:205b-2: aom ni re pha'i thig le rdzogs //

K12D0430_H0406:207a-30: dkar po nyid ni mi bskyod pa'o //

K12D0430_H0406:207a-32: snang ba mtha' yas dud nyid dang //

K12D0430_H0406:207b-2: sa yi gdugs ni sangs rgyas spyan //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-3: le'u bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:207b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;khams bzhi rnam par mnyam pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-5: khams bzhi ru ni rnam par 'gro /
K12D0430_H0406:207b-6: me dang chu ni 'di bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-7: nam mkha' yang ni stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-8: sra ba nyid ni sa yin no //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-9: dro ba'i dngos bo me dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-10: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-11: spyi bor dkar po yi sa bon //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-12: shar du mi [?] bskyod pa nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-13: aa yi rnam pa de nyid lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-14: h'um gis don yod rnam par gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-15: lho yi phyogs su brtsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-16: tram gi rnam pa mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-17: de nyid snang ba mtha' yas lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-18: cod pan nub kyi phyogs su 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-19: de nyid mchod pa mnyam pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-20: tram gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-22: spyi gtsug la sogs lha lnga ni //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-23: blo dang shes pas rnam par dgod //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-24: tram gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-25: dpral ba khro bo'i phyag can no //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-26: ka yi rnam pa ye shes lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-27: mi g-yo sa yi mgon po bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-28: hr'i: yi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-29: de bzhin zla ba mig gnyis su'o //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-30: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o;; ;;de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-31: dzam gyi rnam pas bdag po'i lha //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-32: rna bar byams pa nyid yin no //
K12D0430_H0406:207b-33: ksham gi rnam pas bdag po'i lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-2: sa yi rnam pas bdag po'i lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-3: lce la yang ni m'a ma k'i //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-4: h'um gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-5: mgrin par rta mgrin khro bo bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-6: shr'im gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-7: ye shes lha ni mchog tu gtso //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-8: snying po yi ni ye shes mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:208a-9: sor mo lnga dang mnyam pa'i lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-10: lnga ni sangs rgyas nyid yin no //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-11: aa yis bdud rtsi lha mo ni //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-12: lag mthil rdo rje sgeg mo bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-13: shrim gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-14: lte bar rnam par sel ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-15: tsum gi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-16: de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-17: lam gyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-18: de bzhin brla gnyis sa snying po //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-19: yum gyi rnam pas mnga' bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-20: pus mo yi dvags lha mo 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-21: tram gi rnam pas yi dvags lha //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-23: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:208a-24: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-25: aom hr'i he ha ha ha h'um phat/
K12D0430_H0406:208a-26: 'di ni nye ba'i cho ga'i sngags so //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-27: sku mdog sngon po khro gnyer ldan pa'i zhal dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-28: spyan gsum zhal dang rked pa spyi bo cod pan can //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-29: sbyor ba'i gdan bdun mngon pa'i phyag rgya dbang dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-30: dar gyis mngon par gang ba'i gdeng sa ka'i rna cha dang //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-31: sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs ni lhag par ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:208a-32: dmar po'i gos dang sbrul gyi pags pa bsnams //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-0: g-yon gyi phyag na snod @208b ni rab gang mdzes //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-1: gnyis par dbyug pa gsum par dgra sta dang //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-2: gyen du ba dan dang ni dril bu g-yas pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-3: rdo rje gsor dang lcags kyu dril bu'i phyag /
K12D0430_H0406:208b-4: pad gdan nyi ma'i phyag can me dkyil la //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-5: he ru ka dpal mgon po shin tu 'jigs //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-6: shar gyi char ni m'a ma k'i //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-7: thod pa phyag na bsnams pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-8: lho yi char ni sangs rgyas spyan //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-9: phyag gi 'khyud pa'i tshul bzhin no //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-10: nub tu sgrol ma drir bshad pa /
K12D0430_H0406:208b-11: de bzhin phyag na me tog phreng //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-12: gos dkar gtor ma yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-13: byang gi phyogs su dgod par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-14: dbang ldan rdo rje sgeg mo dang //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-15: me ru bil ba lag pa ma //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-16: bden bral du ni glu ma dang //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-17: rlung du gar ma bskyod pa bzhin pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-18: le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:208b-19: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:208b-32: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
K12D0430_H0406:208b-35: aom badzra ghande ho: aom padma aud bh'a ba ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0430_H0406:208b-41: bh'a be na su ra aa ga ma n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0430_H0406:208b-42: le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:208b-43: padma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog /
K12D0430_H0406:209a-1: po shin tu snang mdzad dang //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-2: ro ni bdud rtsi chu yi ngo bo nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-3: mtheb mdzub kyis ni sa yi steng du dor //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-4: dbus ma'i ri rab kyis ni bdud rtsi bsrub //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-5: ji bzhin gnas brgyad 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-6: ha yi rnam pas kha dog 'phrog /
K12D0430_H0406:209a-7: ho zhes bya bas dri med byed //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-8: dpa' bo hr'i: yi rnam pas 'joms //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-9: rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-10: lha rnams kun nas lcags kyu yis //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-11: bdud rtsi'i yi ges tshim par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-12: lcags kyu kun nas skyod byed cing //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-13: rnal 'byor bdag nyid mtshan nyid yin; ;dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin de nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-14: dud pa'i sa bon gyis ni sbyang //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-15: gtor ma sbyang ba byas pa yin //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-16: de yi sa bon gyis de sbyang //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-17: logs su kha khyer gsum byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-18: pho nya rnal 'byor mas spyan drangs //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-19: ka da ka da bandha bandha na hri kha kha
K12D0430_H0406:209a-20: kha sha trum dza dza sha trum m'a ra na
K12D0430_H0406:209a-21: ba li ba ta li dhe ba ti she sva
K12D0430_H0406:209a-22: / le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:209a-23: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-24: 'jim pa las ni gzugs brnyan bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-25: zhal gsum spyan gsum rkang pa gsum //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-26: phyag gsum rab tu bzhad pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-27: glang po'i mig can ro langs ma //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-28: rtag tu ral gri zhags pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-29: gos dmar pags pa dmar po mnabs //
K12D0430_H0406:209a-30: zhabs gnyis skad cig sa la mnan pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-0: ro langs phyag rgya snying @209b gar mngon par bsdigs //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-1: h'um gi sgra yi sa bon bzlas pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-2: bstan pa srung zhing skems pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-3: mngon du pho nya chen po 'ong //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-5: n'a da n'a da h'um h'um phat phat/
K12D0430_H0406:209b-6: 'di ni pho nya mchog gi sngags //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-7: dbang dang mngag la de bzhin ming //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-8: dug dang lhan cig sbyar byas pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-9: khrag gis mngon par bri bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-10: rkang pas mngon du mnan byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-11: blo dang ldan pas rim bzhin bzlas //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-12: lan gcig bzlas shing lan gcig min //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-13: lan gcig phyag rgya bsnun par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-14: ming ni brgya phrag brgya phrag gsum //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-15: nag mo ser skya tsandan dang //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-16: dmar po'i me tog sa bon gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-17: dkyil 'khor gsum ni bri bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-18: gu gul nag po'i bdug pa bri //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-19: de yi gtor ma ldan dbul bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-20: ser skya'i pho nya mo zhes bya //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-21: le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:209b-22: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-23: mi shes mun pa nyid dang 'bu dang srin bu'i 'khor los khyab //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-24: mi rnams sdig pa'i khyad par nyin re bzhin du spyod pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-25: dge ba'i lam chen dag nas mi ni dbu ma'i skye bar skye //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-26: thos la mngon par dga' zhing spro zhing rnam par lta ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-27: mi yi ye shes mchog dang mchog tu 'gyur ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-28: rgyal ba'i thar pa don dam mchog tu rnam par shes //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-29: phra zhing shin tu phra ba de nyid rab tu phra //
K12D0430_H0406:209b-30: dngos po med cing dngos po dang bral ba //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-1: ba'i dngos po bde bar rtogs //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-2: shes pas bsgoms pa dag pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-3: mnyam par dag pa dbu ma'o //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-4: rtag tu bdag med rnam par dag /
K12D0430_H0406:210a-5: 'dod pas rnam par mi gos pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-6: le'u bdun pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:210a-7: sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos po yis //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-8: rtag tu spyi bor brgyan pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-9: gnyis med phyag rgya'i gnas su ni; ;de la rgya mtsho chu nyid bsgom //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-10: spyi gtsug rnam shes tshim par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-11: g-yon gyi phyogs su mi bskyod pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-12: don yod grub pa g-yas su bzhugs //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-13: rin chen gyi kyang g-yon par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-14: rgyab tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-15: sangs rgyas lnga ni gzung bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-16: gzhan du nam yang ma bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-17: sangs rgyas bstan bcos nyid du gsungs //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-18: snga dro phyi dro nyin phyed dus //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-19: dus gsum du ni rtag tu bzung //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-20: sa bon 'di yis bkrus pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-22: lnga pa yang dag sbyar bas dbul //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-23: tshi ling ga yi thig le sbyang //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-24: gong du bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-25: rnam shes lhan cig dkar ba 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-26: le'u brgyad pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:210a-27: ae ma'o las ni mchog tu gtso //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-28: aa ma'o rnal 'byor rmad du byung //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-29: ae ma'o chos ni mchog thob pas //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-30: drang srong lhan cig ngo mtshar skyes //
K12D0430_H0406:210a-31: ye shes mchog gi chos 'di ni //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-0: byang chub @210b sems dpa' 'dus nas gsungs //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-1: ye shes yid kyi chos can ni //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-2: tshig gis khyod la bshad pa yin //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-3: ye shes phyag rgya mchog nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-4: ye shes rtsa ba yang dag 'byung //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-5: shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-6: dag pa gnyis su med pa'i rtags //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-7: lha yi yan lag mchod pa pos //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-8: gnyis med dgod par yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-9: gnyis med rnam shes ngo bo yis //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-10: blo ldan bdud rtsi shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-11: bdud rtsi chu ni dbul ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-12: phyi rol rnal 'byor ma mchod do //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-13: gnyis med phyag rgya'i rdo rje 'di //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-14: rtsa gsum gnyis med phyag rgyas bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-15: rkang pas padmar mnyam zhon pas //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-17: rdo rje padma mnyam pa'i dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-18: skyes bus h'um gi sgra byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-19: rang bzhin gyis ni sgra 'byin cing //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-20: gnyis ga'i ye shes dkar po bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-21: de yi rang bzhin gyis ni rdul //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-22: du ba'i sa bon gyis sbyar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-23: dbang po ru rta bil bar mnyam //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-24: kha ra sbrang rtsi ba la sha //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-25: bdud rtsi chu dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-26: rgyu skar zla ba lha nyid la //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-27: byin nas don chen dbang du byed //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-28: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:210b-29: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-30: stong nyid ngo bo'i tshul gyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-31: phyi dang nang du bcas par ro //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-32: ye shes chos kyi sbyor ba las //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-33: ye shes kyi ni sbyor ba mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:210b-34: thams cad lus la gnas pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:210b-35: rmongs pas kun tu mi shes pas //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-1: phyir rmongs pa yongs spangs la //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-2: ye shes kyi ni gnas brtsam bya //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-5: gcig pu'i sbyor bas grub pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-6: gcig pus 'gro ba brtsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-7: pyis pa'i skye bos mthong ba yi //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-8: de phyir de nyid gcig pu ni //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-9: gnas med gnas ni shes byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-10: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo la //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-11: gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-12: gnyis kyi shes pa rnam par spangs //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-13: de nyid rig pa mchog tu phra //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-14: sbyor ba'ang mchog tu phra ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-15: mgrin pa rkan gyi steng du bzla //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-16: smin ma'i dbus dang mig gi rtsar //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-17: sgor ni thig le phrar gyur pa //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-18: 'khor lo phra rab rdul lta bur //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-19: dang po mchog dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-20: bla mas bstan las shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-21: rdul phran ye shes de kho na //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-22: de phyir blo ldan gyis shes bya //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-23: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:211a-24: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-25: skyon dang yon tan dngos po spang //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-26: kha ga'i sgo ni ji bzhin bsngam //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-27: bug pa dgu dang kha ga nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-28: bu ga dgu las dud pa 'byung //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-29: skyes bu gong gi sgo la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-30: der ni padma dkar po bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-31: lus kun la ni dgod bya zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-32: lha nyid so sor bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-33: lha yi sa bon de nyid kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:211a-34: rdo rje'i phyag rgya dgod pa bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:211b-0: rlung gi @211b dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:211b-2: ye shes rnam shes mchog tu drang //
K12D0430_H0406:211b-3: dngos dang dngos po phra ba'i de kho na //
K12D0430_H0406:211b-4: dngos dang shin tu 'brel bar mtshungs pa 'o; ;snying gar gnas pa'i snying po mchog ming brjod //
K12D0430_H0406:211b-5: sems kyi rtsa nas de bzhin du hi ka /
K12D0430_H0406:211b-6: steng dang 'og dang de bzhin steng //

K12D0430_H0406:212a-2: thar pa thob pa'i dus su ni //

K12D0430_H0406:212a-15: ti la ti la yi ni mtha'//

K12D0430_H0406:212a-21: bdag nyid lus la dgod pa ni //

K12D0430_H0406:212a-25: las bzhi yi ni blo can gyi //
K12D0430_H0406:212a-26: de bzhin sa bon sngon du bsnyen //
K12D0430_H0406:212a-27: aom a'a gatstsham tu de ba sam ye a'a karsha ya h'um phat/
K12D0430_H0406:212a-29: le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o ////

K12D0430_H0406:212a-31: aom aa ksho ni tyam mah'a n'a ga t'a ksha

K12D0430_H0406:212a-34: aom dha n'a dhi bim a'a dzny'a na yaksha no /

K12D0430_H0406:212b-3: ma ya aud ma he phu phu phu dza: 'byung
K12D0430_H0406:212b-4: bo'i sngags so // aom ghu ru ghu ru a'a
K12D0430_H0406:212b-5: karsha ya h'um hri dza: 'byung po dgug pa'i dam
K12D0430_H0406:212b-7: le'u bdun pa zhes bya [?] ba'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:212b-8: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

K12D0430_H0406:212b-10: gang gis rnam par mi log [?] shes //

K12D0430_H0406:212b-13: gang zhig gsang ba mi shes pa //

K12D0430_H0406:212b-28: brgyad pa ste de rnams kyi bde bar gshegs pas

K12D0430_H0406:212b-31: rnam par dbye ba rdzogs so ////
K12D0430_H0406:213a-3: de bzhin sbyor ba'i bstan bcos dang //

K12D0430_H0406:213a-5: gnas gtsang gnas na bzhugs nas su //

K12D0430_H0406:213a-16: yul 'khor skye mched lus rgyal nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-17: sgo lnga las ni drang par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-18: chu dang me dang nam mkha' rlung //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-19: 'di ni lus la gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-20: chu ni dbang phyug rgyal chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-21: de bzhin bdud rtsi dkar po'i rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-22: me ni du bar 'bar bzhin drag /
K12D0430_H0406:213a-24: dbang chen dung gi rang bzhin rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-25: mi rtag pas ni yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-26: nam mkha' nam mkha'i rtsa nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-27: padma de bzhin brtan zhing rtag /
K12D0430_H0406:213a-28: gi wang rnam par rmongs pa'i rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-29: lus po bskyed cing sdug bsngal gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-30: dri med gsum ni g-yo ba'i rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-31: skra ni bsgrub par dkar ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-32: 'byed pa nyon mongs nyid kyi rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:213a-33: sdig pa'i rtsa dang sdig pa'i gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:213b-0: @213b mi shes pa dang phyugs nyid yin //
K12D0430_H0406:213b-1: sa gdugs rtsa ni dbang phyug mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:213b-2: dkar po myu gu rab dbye dang //

K12D0430_H0406:213b-4: sa ni dung du gsungs ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:213b-6: rmongs pas sred cing 'jigs pa'i dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:213b-7: de bzhin nyon mongs sdig pa'i gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:213b-8: g-yo zhing g-yo ba'i blo nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:213b-9: mi shes phyugs kyi rtsa nyid la //

K12D0430_H0406:213b-11: dbye bas rnam pa bco brgyad ni //

K12D0430_H0406:213b-13: 'gro ba'i bsod nams sdig gi gzhi //

K12D0430_H0406:214a-2: spyi bor dkar po'i gnas rang bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-3: rgyas pa lnga yi steng du ni //

K12D0430_H0406:214a-14: sngon du du ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-15: dud pa 'bar ba'i rtsa chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-16: dpung pa'i ngos su yang dag nas //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-17: brang dang rus sbal mtshams su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-18: rtsa ni mtshams kyi dbus su 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-19: lag pa'i sor mo'i dbyibs lta bu //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-20: sor mo dang ni sen mo'i rgyab //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-21: dud pa lhag pa'i rtsa nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-22: brang nyid du ni yongs su grags //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-23: logs dang de bzhin nye ba yi //

K12D0430_H0406:214a-25: lud pa dri pa mchan khung mnyam //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-26: ro stod lag pa'i rtsa ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-27: rked pa'i rgyab kyi rtsa nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-28: dung nyid du ni yongs su grags //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-29: dang ba'i mtshams dang rked pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-30: brla dang brlar ni nye bar mtshon //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-31: 'gro ba yi ni lto ba'i rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-32: rkang pa dus kyi me dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-33: padma rkang pa mnga' bdag nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:214a-34: rtsar ni blo dang ldan pas shes //

K12D0430_H0406:214b-1: bla ma'i pha rol 'gro ba'i rtsa //

K12D0430_H0406:214b-4: gtso bo'i dbyings su grags pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-5: ri med rkang pa g-yon par gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-6: rkang pa'i gnad dang sna yi rtse //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-7: pus mo'i rjes su skyod pa 'o //

K12D0430_H0406:214b-11: mchan khung dang ni mchan khung ming //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-12: drag po'i tshogs kyi de bzhin rtsa //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-13: dra bar gnas pa'ang de bzhin no //

K12D0430_H0406:214b-16: lus su yongs su grags pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-17: sa gdugs dpung pa g-yon pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-18: de bzhin brang du yang dag gnas //

K12D0430_H0406:214b-21: skya mched drug gi dbye ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-22: rang bzhin gyis ni gru bzhi dang //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-23: rang bzhin gyis ni 'bab pa'i gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-24: rang dang skye bu la yang skye //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-25: don dam nyid du dngos med cing //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-26: 'jig rten la phan snying brtse bas //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-27: kun tu 'byung ba skyon med pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-28: 'gro ba'i gnas kyi ye shes cho ga mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:214b-29: dngos med dag pa don dam dbu ma pa //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-30: ma rig nas brtsams bcu gnyis sa dbang phyug /
K12D0430_H0406:214b-31: bri sha bha sogs re ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:214b-32: bdud rtsi sbyor ba mi skye 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-0: @215a *// dbus su yang dag sbyor ba gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-1: srid pa'i nyes pa rnam par spangs //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-2: bcu gnyis sbyor ba'i gnas su na //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-3: rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas pas shes //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-4: rtsa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:215a-5: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-6: kun nas skye ba'i dbye ba'i cha //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-7: skyes bu so sor gnas pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-8: rtsa dang dbugs ni so so yi //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-9: gzhan gyi rkang pa chad pa na //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-10: rnam pa mang du bdag po'i rlung //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-12: brang gi 'og dang rked pa'i gong //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-13: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-14: dngos med dngos po yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-15: kha dog med la mtshon kun dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-16: gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-17: stong dang stong min don gyi gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-18: ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po che //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-19: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-20: rnam shes las ni byed pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-21: bcu gnyis dngos po bsgyur ba'i bdag /
K12D0430_H0406:215a-22: sum brgya de bzhin drub cu yi //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-23: chu tshod dbugs ni rtsa bzhin no //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-24: snga dro dkar po rgyu ba nas //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-25: nyin dang mtshan du shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-26: 'pho ba bcu gnyis bdag nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-27: nyin mtshan du yang de bzhin no //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-28: bcu gnyis sa la chad pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-29: byang du bgrod pa'i mtshan mo'o //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-30: lho phyogs su yang sngon bzhin du //
K12D0430_H0406:215a-31: nyin mo'i rlung ni chad pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-0: bi shu'i bar du zas @215b sbyar ba //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-1: rim bzhin rab tu grags pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-2: dbugs kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-3: ye shes can gyis las la sbyar //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-4: mtha' ma'i yul dang yul 'khor gyi //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-6: ro hi ta dang mo hi ta //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-7: bzang po khyu mchog bla ma dang //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-8: kur ma ma ka randha dang //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-9: de bzhin rmi lam lkugs pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-11: bcu gnyis sa na srid pa'i skyon //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-12: ro hi ta la lha mchod bya //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-13: mo hi ha la nor rnyed cing //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-14: bzang po la ni mdzes par bza'//
K12D0430_H0406:215b-15: mang du khro ba bhe sha ba //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-16: kur ma mchog tu sems khral can //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-17: ma ka ra la gtam gyi gzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-18: bla ma bsgrub pa'i dngos po ni //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-19: randha la ni sdig pa'i blo //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-20: by'a ku li dang nyid dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-21: sva pna la rmi lam tshul //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-22: rmongs pa sems khral mchog dang ni; ;glu dang rig pa klog la mkhas //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-24: bcu gnyis srid pa'i nyes skyon no //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-25: shel lta bur ni gcig gis gtso //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-26: rgyas par tshon rtsi bdun gyis so //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-27: de yi rnam shes srid pa'i dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-28: yul ni dngos po med par gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-29: ye shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:215b-30: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba; ;sku gsum ji ltar stong pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-31: 'di ni dmigs pa bcas pas gzung //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-32: rang bzhin dang bral ma yin pa //
K12D0430_H0406:215b-33: dngos po nam mkha' brtag par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-2: gzugs su mi gnas zad pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-3: lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-4: gzugs ni mi gnas zad par byed //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-5: phyi stong 'og kyang stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-6: skyon med dbus ni stong pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-7: thams cad stong pa nyid dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-9: yul lnga yang ni stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-10: de bzhin dbang po la sogs pa'ang //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-11: stong par mi brtag yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-12: de phyir rdul med stong pa'i tshul //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-13: ji ltar zhing pas zhing ni thabs kyis yang sbyangs nas //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-14: thong pas rmo zhing thong pas kun du rab bsgyur pas //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-15: zhing la gnod pa'i rtsva dang ljon shing rgya cher sel //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-16: des na rnam dag gtsang sbra can zhes brjod de bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-17: de bas mchog tu sbyor ba'i bdag /
K12D0430_H0406:216a-18: gnyis pa yang ni gzhag par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-19: de ltar de bzhin phyi nyid bkru //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-20: de phyir mkhas pas stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-21: gsum gyi tshul gyis dgag par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-22: de bzhin gzugs dang stong pa bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-23: dbus su rnam shes sa bon no //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-24: sa bon sa bon myu gu dang //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-25: gzugs dang dbang po rtsa yi gzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-26: rang bzhin tshul gyis cha shas mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-27: skyon med rdo rje'i rang bzhin ming dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-28: dbang po drug dang cho ga drug ni yang dag 'byung //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-29: lha gnas bcu gnyis sa ni sarba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:216a-30: sngags kyi yi ge mchog nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-0: yid @216b kyi 'phrul pas bsgrub par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-1: ae ma'o sems can nyon re mongs //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-2: sngags ni au gu au gu dang //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-3: nyams pa'i gzugs brnyan mnyam bsgom pa //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-4: snying po nyid kyis rnam par spangs //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-5: sngags kyi yi ge dam pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-6: de phyir yid kyis rjes su 'brang //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-7: sems can thams cad bskyed cing g-yo zhing bskyed pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-8: sngags ni blo dang ldan pas nges par shes par
K12D0430_H0406:216b-9: bya; ;de nyid med pa'i sngags kyis 'gro ba rmongs
K12D0430_H0406:216b-10: par mthong // log par smra ba yi ni gzugs brnyan sems dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-11: sngags kyi bdag nyid don dam mchog gi yi ge
K12D0430_H0406:216b-12: yis; ;las bzhi yi ni cho ga mongs su grags
K12D0430_H0406:216b-13: pa'o // stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:216b-14: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-15: skyon dang yon tan spangs gyur pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-16: dbu ma'i gnas ni skyon med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-17: rang bzhin dag pa'i yid las 'byung ba'i lus //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-18: bdag med rnal 'byor gcig gi yid kyis sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-19: ji ltar ma bsregs snod kyi chu bzhin du //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-20: khyod kyis nang gi rnal 'byor mang du 'jig pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-21: ji ltar rdza mkhan gyis ni me ni kun tu gang bas 'gengs //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-22: du ma dbus su zad par byas pas rang gi gzugs bzhin no //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-23: nang gi ye shes dbang phyug me ni 'bar ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-24: de yi gzhig pas 'dir ni gzugs ni grol ba bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:216b-25: rang bzhin dag pas dag pa'i chos //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-0: @217a *// dag pa'i dbyangs kyi lam chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-1: ma dag rmongs ba'i rgya mtsho ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-2: rnam rtog bcas pa rnam par spang //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-3: dag pa'i chos ni mchog tu zhi //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-4: dag pa'i chos ni skyon med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-5: dag pas byang chub thob pa'i phyir //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-6: dag pa'i chos ni rab tu bstan //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-7: dang por gzhu las rgyal ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-8: gsher ba nub tu mchog tu brtson //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-9: sku gsum ma ni lhan cig gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-10: blo dang ldan pas sa bon bskrun //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-11: de yi gnas su srog gsungs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-12: snga dro skyes bu gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-13: dbugs ni yang dag 'pho ba'i tshe //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-14: rim bzhin bcu gnyis sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-15: lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-16: de yi sa bon phyugs su gsungs //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-17: chu shing me tog lte bar gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-18: snying gar 'greng bar gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-19: kha ni 'og tu zlum pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-20: mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-21: bdud rtsi'i yi ge sgra yis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-22: yid 'ong lhan cig dgram par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-23: de yi dbang phyug ye shes rgyal //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-24: sgong skyes bcu gsum dbang phyug go /
K12D0430_H0406:217a-25: kha dog bdun par rnam mang po //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-26: de bzhin 'od zer nyi ma brgya //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-27: ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag /
K12D0430_H0406:217a-29: ji ltar dar gyi mig gi bar //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-31: ji ltar rmongs pa'i mi shes pa //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-32: ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs gcod //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-33: de dag mar me'i rgya mtsho yis //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-34: ye shes can gyis rang 'dod lam //
K12D0430_H0406:217a-35: de nas sems can kun rang bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-0: yan lag @217b rlung gis gzir ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-1: rang dbang nyid dang rlung dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-2: de bzhin ba spu'i bu ga 'di //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-3: rlung dang mnyam pa'i lus med cing //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-4: rlung gi sems la'ang med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-5: lus kyi dbyings nyid la yang ni; ;stong pa yan lag kun la gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-6: thams cad chu yi rang bzhin nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-7: lus po yang ni sems kyi ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-8: thams cad sha ni chu rang bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-9: chu yis thams cad khyab pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-10: sa dang chu yang mtshungs par ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-11: phyi rol khyab par brtags pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-12: de bzhin lus po yi ni chu //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-13: thams cad khyab par yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-14: lus la me ni drod bcas pas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-15: dbyibs la thams cad kun nas 'bar; ;sa yis thams cad kun du ni //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-16: gzugs la yon tan dbang pos brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-17: de phyir 'byung ba bzhi yi lus //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-18: khams dang rtsa yi khyab pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-19: rtsa ni mnyam pa'i cha yi dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-20: mnyam pa'i dbyibs su rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-21: lha bsgom pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:217b-22: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-23: lha rnams lnga ni gang du gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-24: bug pa gsum dang sgo dgu yi; ;de bzhin bdag nyid lha yi gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-25: rlung bsngams sku yi mer bcas pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-26: snying ga'i sgong skyes kyi ni gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-27: phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-28: de bzhin sgo nas mtshon pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-29: sgo dgu yi ni dbyibs nyid dang //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-30: 'dab ma brgyad par yang dag grags //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-31: phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-32: de ltar lha ni phra zhing phra //
K12D0430_H0406:217b-33: lnga pa lnga yi lnga bdag lha //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-0: rang bzhin gyis khyab rnam par @218a *//
K12D0430_H0406:218a-2: so ti ke ni gcig nyid dang //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-3: de bzhin chu dang chu min gnyis //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-4: de bzhin ji ltar bug pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-5: tshigs dgu dang ni sgo dgu dang //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-6: rtsa dgur yang dag grags pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-7: dang por stong pa nyid kyi dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-8: steng dang dbus dang mnyam pa'i gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-9: gzugs dang tshor ba mnyam pa yang //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-10: dngos med stong pa'i ngo bo'o //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-11: rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-12: de dbus ge sar bcas pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-13: dgu ru chu ni sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-14: de bzhin padma chu shing gi /
K12D0430_H0406:218a-15: de yi ye shes dbang phyug lha //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-16: sgong skyes khyim pa mnyam par brten //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-17: 'dab ma brgyad la sa bon ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-18: rim pa ji bzhin rtsa yi lha //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-19: de yi rgyab kyis rtsa la yang //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-20: bdag nyid sgo ni phra ba bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-21: phye nas bdag nyid brgyan pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-22: kun nas lha yis lhag par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-23: de yi bdag nyid lhar sbyangs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-24: sbyor ba'i lus sogs nyid kyi dbyibs //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-25: sbyor med gal te sbyor byas pas //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-26: sngon bzhin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-27: rdo rje snying po'i lus la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-28: lhag par lha dang lha yis brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-29: ji ltar gdol pa'i khang pa mes bsregs na //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-30: lha la sogs pa'i gnas su rab byed pa //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-31: dge dang rigs can mkhas pa mnyam par bsten //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-32: de bzhin rmongs ba rgya mtsho lnga yi gzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:218a-33: sgong skyes kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:218a-34: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-0: nges par rnal @218b 'byor pas rdub pa //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-1: ji ltar rdub pa'i bdag nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-2: sgo ni sa bon gyis bsdams bya //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-3: sa bon dgu yis bsdams pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-4: rnal 'byor dgu yi bdag nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-5: ji ltar tshangs pa'i sgo bsngam zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-6: mchod rten gyi yang sgo dgu yang //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-7: dbugs mi g-yo ba'i dngos po yis //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-8: bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsdam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-9: bsdus nas gnas pa'i mtha' ru ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-10: rang bzhin gyis ni g-yo ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-11: gzhan yang drag po'i ming gnyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-12: dud pa'i sa bon gyis ni rtse //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-13: de ltar rdub pa mnyam pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-14: yi ge phyed dang gnyis spyad bya //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-15: h'um gi rnam pa g-yo ba'i dbyibs //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-16: mnyam par rdub pa'i 'bar ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-17: 'tshe med rnam par rtse ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-19: bcu gnyis sa yi dbang phyug ma //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-20: de bzhin dbugs ni rdubs pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-21: tshe rabs sngon gyi sdig pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-22: yul dang dbang po nye gnas pa //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-23: bde sbyor rdub pa'i rgya mtsho yis //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-24: ye shes can gyis sdig pa gcod //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-25: ji bzhin sngon du mnyam drangs nas //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-26: mtha' yi gcig ni gzung byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-27: sa bon yi ge gcig bzung pas //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-28: de yis sgo brgyad mnyam pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-29: bcu gnyis spangs pa'i bsgom pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-30: sgo brgyad rnam par rtse ba'o; ;ji ltar rgyal po sbyangs pas rab bsgyur ba //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-31: drod dang ba lang rang bzhin lus kyi las //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-32: phyis ni rang 'dod rba rlabs rgya chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:218b-33: de bzhin lus ni rang 'dod mtshon gyi gtso //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-1: ba sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:219a-2: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-3: 'byin byed tshogs ni dgu ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-4: phra ba'i rnam par bshad pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-5: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-6: bcu gnyis dgu yi rim pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-7: dgu yi sbyor ba la rab brten //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-8: 'di ni dgu yi rlung ji bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-9: rnam shes rlung gi dkyil 'khor la; ;rlung gi dbus su me yi dbyibs //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-10: me yi du ba'i yig de bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-11: au ni re phar yang dag ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-12: sgra ni rgya mtshol bshad pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-13: de bzhin thig le ye shes gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-14: sgra dang sgra yis bsgom pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-15: bshad pa'i sgo nas de bzhin du //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-16: srid pa'i nyes las yang dag 'pho //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-17: sna dang rnab mig las mi //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-18: mi rnams kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-19: lte ba'i thig le de bzhin steng; ;gong gi gnas ni shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-20: sems kyi rtsa dang 'dra ba yi //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-21: snying gar de bzhin sbyong ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-22: 'phyar bar rlung gi sa bon ni //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-23: mnyam pa'i gnas su shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-24: de ltar nga yis mtshan nyid bshad //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-25: gzhan du bla ma ston pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-26: steng du tshangs pa'i sgo 'di ni //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-27: mod la 'pho ba'i ming du bshad //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-28: ji ltar bung ba me tog bu gar ni //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-29: rgyags pas myos nas sems mi zhu ba ltar //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-30: de bzhin ye shes dbang phyug sgor gnas la //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-31: aud [?] tra yi rab tu pas 'jig pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219a-32: ae ma'o chos ni mchog gi lam //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-1: ae ma'o grol ba'i go 'phang gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-2: ae ma'o ye shes ngo mtshar che //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-3: 'pho ba sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:219b-4: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-6: dang por gzugs ni sbyang bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-7: bdag nyid mdun du yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-8: bdag nyid lta dang de bzhin gzhan //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-9: shes pa gzhan la rmongs pa rnams //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-10: ming gi yi ge mnyam por drang //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-11: 'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-12: sgong skyes kyi ni dbus su thim //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-13: ye shes lus la bsgom byas pas //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-14: blo ldan lus ni rnam par 'pho //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-15: sngon du rdub cing 'byin pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-17: sdig bral spyod pa med pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-18: sdig spangs spyod pas yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-19: nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i sdig pa sbyong //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-20: sdig spong de bzhin rmongs pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-21: sbyor ba yis ni sdig pa sbyong //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-22: spyod med sdig pa sbyong ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-23: rtag tu sdig sbyong lam la gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-24: sbyor ba'i lus ni skyon med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-25: dbugs kyi mthar ni gnas pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-26: 'di yis steng du grol bar gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-27: dbugs ni lte bar gtong ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-28: sems ni gzugs med srid par ro //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-29: sdig pa kun nas mi gnas pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-30: nyes pa kun gyi gos pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-31: 'pho ba'i sbyor ba sbyar bar grol //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-32: pha dang ma ni gsad bya zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-33: rgyal po dang ni gtsang sbra gnyis //
K12D0430_H0406:219b-34: yul 'khor bcas pa bcom byas na //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-2: dus la bab na 'pho bya ste //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-3: dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-4: ji srid yun ring 'tsho zhing chos spyod pa //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-5: de srid dge ba'i rgyun ni 'phel ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-6: ji ltar bum pa mkhan ni mkhas pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-7: lo zlas gnas ni snod ni du mas 'gengs //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-8: mig dang dbyibs med 'khor lo 'ji ba'ang med //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-9: rnam shes ye shes rnam pa kun du brtag /
K12D0430_H0406:220a-10: lus yang dag par 'pho ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:220a-11: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-12: sbyor ba'i bstan bcos sgrub pa pos //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-13: rdub pa'i bdag nyid dbye ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-14: sor bzhi las ni nam mkha' 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-15: 'gengs pa'i las ni skar ma dang //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-16: gong bu me yi phung po nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-17: me yi dbus su yi ge aa //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-18: nam mkha' dang ni zla ba 'di //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-19: dbus su bdud rtsi'i thig pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-20: 'khor lo nyi ma'i dra ba can //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-21: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa rnam par 'phyin //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-23: dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-24: dbus su aa yig sngon bo'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-25: 'od zer la ni de bzhin phyogs //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-26: ri rab dbus su 'bar ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-27: thig le'i sgo ru snang ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-28: aa yig rnam pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-29: kha dog gnyis pa'i lha nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-30: ji ltar bug par stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-31: rtag tu stong pa'i lha nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-32: sna bug ji ltar bzod pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:220a-33: lce yi yang ni bdud rtsi'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-0: yi ge gsum @220b ni sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-1: rmongs pa mgrin pa dbyangs yig sbyar //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-2: au ni rnam pa rim bzhin mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:220b-3: kun nas nyon mongs lhag par sel //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-4: h'um gi yi ge dbang phyug mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:220b-5: sngon du padma mnyam pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-6: sgong skyes sngon du bzod pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-7: de yi lha ni lhag par rdzogs //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-8: 'od zer bye ba rnam mang po //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-9: de yi ye shes dbang phyug rgyal //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-10: dbugs mi g-yo bar bsgom par bya; ;stobs 'jigs pa yi dbyug pa can //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-11: h'um gi rnam pa mnga' bdag dbang //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-12: lte bar ji ltar gtso bo nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-13: ae yi rnam pa brda yi lus //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-14: kun nas dgod pa rnam par bshad //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-15: bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-16: bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-17: bdag nyid gdan du grags pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-18: bdag nyid lha ni mchod par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-19: bdag gi gdan gyi le'u bya ba ste bcu pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:220b-20: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-21: 'od zer gyi ni mtshan nyid dag /
K12D0430_H0406:220b-22: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-23: sa ni sbyang bar bya ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-24: h'um gi rnam pas padma bsgyur; ;nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzhi la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-25: cod pan rab tu 'god par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-26: gal te bdag nyid lhar 'dod pas //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-27: dbugs las lha ni dbyung bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-28: gzugs rdzogs yid du 'ong ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-29: mchog gi go 'phang bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-30: gnas brgyad so so lha la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-31: phyag rgya brgyad ni bstan par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:220b-32: las dang las kyi khyad par la //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-2: sa yi rnam pa zhi ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-3: de bzhin ksha yi rnam pas rgyas //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-4: dbang la yam gi yi ge shis //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-5: ha yi rnam pa mngon par spyod //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-6: mchod pa cho ga kun rdzogs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-7: gzhan du bltas nas shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-8: phyis ni las la rab tu 'jug /
K12D0430_H0406:221a-9: rang gi lus la thim par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-10: gzhan gyi gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:221a-11: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-12: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-13: lus kyi rtsar ni rab tu nges //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-14: stong phrag dgu yi grangs las ni //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-15: bye ba brgya sogs dga' bar gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-16: stong ba'i dbyibs ni sngon 'gro bas //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-17: blo dang ldan pas sa bon bskrun //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-18: zag pa'i lus ni bcom nas kyang //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-19: de yi snying gar padma nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-20: sgong skyes stong pa yi ni gzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-21: de ltar gnas la mnyam sbyor bas //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-22: de yi gnas su shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-24: phra rab rdul bzhin gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-25: padma'i rtsa ni so sor bsdam //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-27: kun tu rdzogs pa'i lus po 'byung //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-28: kun tu rdzogs pa lha yi sku //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-29: rnal 'byor pa yis kun du blta //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-30: 'dod khams srid pa'i gzugs can sogs //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-31: rgyun du rnal 'byor la brten pas //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-32: rten gyi ye shes des mthong ngo //
K12D0430_H0406:221a-33: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-0: @221b me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-2: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-4: de dbus ji skad gsungs pa yi; ;sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i ming //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-5: dngos po mi g-yo bar bsgoms pas //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-6: nyon mongs srid pa'i rgya mtsho zad //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-7: ye shes nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pas //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-8: de yi ye shes de dbang phyug /
K12D0430_H0406:221b-9: ji ltar byis pa pha ma'i gnas su rtse ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-10: tshig nyid dang ni lus ni 'bar zhing g-yo ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-11: phyi nas 'di yi ye shes de ni shin tu bsgrim //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-12: de ltar rnal 'byor bla mas bstan bde yang //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-13: sbyor ba'i gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:221b-14: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-15: sbyor ba mchog ni mnyam bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-16: rang bzhin med pa bya ba'i tshig /
K12D0430_H0406:221b-17: lhag pa'i gnas su lus bral ba //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-18: phra ba'i dngos po gos pa med //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-19: rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsngam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-20: de bzhin mchod rten dbang phyug go /
K12D0430_H0406:221b-21: chu min nas ni gyen du dbugs //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-22: de bzhin lto ba rlung gis gang //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-23: ye shes thig le gnas nas gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-24: rnam par shes pa nges par thim //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-26: mnyam par gzhag pa'i ngo bos sgom //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-27: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdubs pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-28: dbus su ye shes skyon med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-29: bla mas bshad pa'i lam gyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:221b-30: rtag tu nges par blta ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-1: nu gtam gyis rmongs nas su //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-2: gnyi ga 'tham pa sred nas gtam gyis smras pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-3: lam ni ji ltar bstan kyang bzung bar mi nus pa //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-4: de ltar rnal 'byor pa ni lam ngan bstan pa bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-5: gsang ba'i gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:222a-6: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-7: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-8: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-9: de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-10: bdag gi sbyor ba'i bsam gtan bya //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-11: lus ni rnam pa gsum nyid dang //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-12: ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-13: yid kyi rnam pa gsum nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-14: lus kyis bsrung zhing rab tu bsdam //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-15: gnyis kyi gnas ni mngon par spang //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-16: ye shes can gyis thar pa bsten //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-17: skad cig longs spyod de bzhin sdug /
K12D0430_H0406:222a-18: gnyis med lhan cig bstan par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-19: tshe 'di nyid la sems can rnams //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-20: skad cig phun tshogs skad cig rgud //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-21: de bzhin rmongs pa'i longs spyod ni //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-22: rnal 'byor pa yis los mi bya //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-23: de phyir nyes pa yi ni gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-24: 'gro ba'i nyes pa srid pa'i dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-25: longs spyod lhag pa'i gnas gcig gi /
K12D0430_H0406:222a-27: sems can sbyin la sred pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-28: longs spyod kyi ni gnas su brjod //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-29: de phyir gnyis pa'i lam spangs la //
K12D0430_H0406:222a-30: rnal 'byor pa yis de bzhin dbus //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-0: sbyor ba'i @222b chos ni mnyam dmigs pas //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-1: spyod pa'i chos ni skyon med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-2: bdag med lus ni yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-3: bdag med la ni mnyam par brten //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-4: bslab bya rtogs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:222b-5: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-6: snying gar zla ba gzhag byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-7: de dbus bdud rtsi yi ge ni //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-8: rnam pa kun tu bdud rtsi sngags //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-10: zhi ba'i gnas su sbyar ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-11: rnal 'byor par ni yongs su grags //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-12: ji ltar de yi zla ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-13: tsi tsa'i yi ges rnam par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-14: gser gyi mdog ltar yid 'ong gzugs //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-15: 'od zer sna tshogs bsgom pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-17: de ltar sangs rgyas sbyor ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-18: h'um gi rnam pa dbang gi dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-19: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-20: 'od zer du ma'i cho ga nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-21: dbang nyid du ni yongs su grags //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-22: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-23: rlung gi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i gzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-25: mngon par spyod par rab tu grags //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-26: las kyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:222b-27: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-28: sbyor ba'i zas sman zhes bya yod [?]; ;'dab ma 'o ma 'dzag pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-29: de bzhin me tog aa dza ga /
K12D0430_H0406:222b-30: dri ni dri zhim rnam par 'byed //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-31: mdog ni ljang dang ser ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:222b-32: rtsa ba gcig gi dbang nyid dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-2: bdud rtsi'i yi ge sgom pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-3: mchod dang bzlas pa'i cho gar sbyar //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-4: mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam pa'i char //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-5: srang ni re re bza' ba nyid; ;brgya dang de bzhin brgyad cu nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-6: mkhas pa yis ni bza' bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-7: rnal 'byor pa yis lo brgya ru //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-8: dben pa'i ril gnas na ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-9: ye shes can gyis ye shes lus //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-10: nges par yongs su rgyas par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-11: dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-12: bkres pa la sogs med par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-13: gnas ni nges pa nyid kyi mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:223a-14: rtsa ba rnal 'byor sbyor bar bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-15: de ltar thos pa'i bdag nyid che //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-16: sbyor ba'i bstan bcos skyon med pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-17: tha mal 'gro bar nges pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-19: de ni yang sos rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-20: ye shes can gyis ye shes rtog /
K12D0430_H0406:223a-21: lnga pa'i lnga ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0430_H0406:223a-23: dpal ldan shes rab dbang po spas pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-24: dngos bo du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-25: rtag tu kun nas rdubs pa'i nga rgyal mi mthun dgra ni dus dang dus su g-yul 'gyed pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:223a-26: chags med ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-0: h'um @223b gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-1: h'um gi rnam pa mchog gi lha //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-2: h'um gi rnam pa stong gyur pa //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-3: yi ge h'um la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-4: yi ge brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-5: spyod bcas mi spyod gsang ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-6: chu dang me dang de bzhin rlung //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-7: sa ni mig gi yi ge 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-8: sgo bzhi dang ni phung po bzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-9: sgong skyes dza lar gnas pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-10: bzhi po nyon mongs ming dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-11: yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-12: rmongs pas sa dang nyon mongs dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-13: sngon du phyugs ni mnyam pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-14: chu shing me tog padma ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-15: 'di yis sgong skyes stan nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-16: ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-17: bdud rtsi brgyad kyis rnam par dbye //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-18: shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-19: snying po yi ni snying po'i mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:223b-20: lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-21: nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-22: sa ni mig la sbyar bya ste //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-23: tshangs par me ni de bzhin 'bar //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-24: rmongs pa yis ni mgrin par ro //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-25: g-yo ba'i snying la gnas pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-26: thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-27: phyugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-28: yan lag brgyad la dgod pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-29: 'di yis lha nyid yang dag shes //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-30: yi ge brgyad kyi sngags 'di ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-31: phyag rgya brgyad du rab tu grags //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-32: dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-33: gnag cing 'bar ba'i las la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-34: las rnams bzhi la lha mo yis //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-35: mkhas pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-36: ye shes dbang phyug snying po nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-37: mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:223b-38: phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-2: thams cad chu yi dbyibs dang ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-3: mnyam par 'jig byed me dang yang //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-4: ji ltar rtag pa rlung dag dang //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-5: dad pa'i don dang sa dbang po; ;lhag ma sa bzhin brtsegs pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-6: bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-7: 'gro ba'i don phyir yi ge brgyad //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-8: lha brgyad du ni yongs su grags //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-9: mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-11: ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-12: sngon du reg cing reg pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-14: rtag tu mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-15: 'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-16: gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-17: bdag gi de nyid mnan pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-19: de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-20: sbyor ba'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-21: dri zhim rab grags me tog kun nas gnas pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-22: nag po'i aa ka ru dang gu gul mar me dang //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-23: gnyis med gtor ma gcig gis yid ni ldan pa
K12D0430_H0406:224a-24: yis; ;lha mo ma mo rnam pa kun nas rab
K12D0430_H0406:224a-25: tu mchod // yi ge brgyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:224a-26: de nas gsang ba'i yan lag gi /
K12D0430_H0406:224a-27: thig le la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-28: khams gsum skyes ba zad byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-29: ye shes dngos po gnas pa bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-30: lha yi dngos po dbyer med pas //
K12D0430_H0406:224a-31: steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-0: thams cad @224b kun nas stong pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-1: ri rab gling gzhan zad byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-2: mnyam nyid sbyor ba kun du bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-3: thams cad sdom pa'i dbye ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-4: de yis me tog thig le yi //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-5: thig le'i dbus su gsal ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-6: ye shes rdul ni rnam par thim //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-7: ye shes blo dang ldan pas shes //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-8: kha dog med cing mtshon kun dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-9: gzugs med ye shes gzugs bzhin no //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-10: ring ba ma yin thung ba min; ;mi ldan pa dang ldan pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-11: gzugs dang stong pa'i de bzhin dbus //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-12: lhan cig ye shes gzung bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-13: nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-14: rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-15: ye shes rdo rje bcom byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-16: snang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-17: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-19: me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-21: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-22: zla ba'i [?] dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-23: de dbus ji skad gsungs pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-24: ye shes dang ni rnam shes sems //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-26: dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-27: ye shes kyi thig le'u sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:224b-28: ka ba gcig dang sgo gsum gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-29: ye shes dbus su thim pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-30: bzlog par bya ba'i sa bon nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-31: sbyang bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-32: brgyad kyi mtha' la gsum pas drang //
K12D0430_H0406:224b-33: sa bon 'di ni drag po'i me //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-2: sngon gsungs mtshan nyid dang ldan pas //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-3: sngon du lhan cig bsgoms ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-4: dkar pos lus ni bsdam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-5: mnyam pa'i gnas su 'bar ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-6: ji skad sngon du gsungs pa'i rlung //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-7: dbus su mchod rten sbyang bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-8: rlung dang me yi bdun don la //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-9: rdo rje'i sa bon bsgom byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-10: sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-11: char gyi rgyun zhes bshad pa yin //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-12: rgyas pa lnga yi sgo nyid la //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-13: kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-14: sgo gnyis mngon par bstan pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-15: de bzhin chu dang chu min gnyis //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-16: yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-17: rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-18: 'di yis lus ni sdam bya zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-19: me ni sgo ru bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-20: sems 'di yis ni dmigs par bya; ;steng du tshangs pa'i sgo 'di ni //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-21: tshigs dgu yi ni mchog gi gdan //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-22: lus med sems kyi ngo bo yis //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-23: dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-24: dus la bab na 'pho bya ste //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-25: dus min lha rnams gsod pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-26: sdig gis kun nas mi gos te //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-27: 'khor ba'i pha rol mchog tu sgrol //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-28: 'pho bar sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:225a-29: sngon gsungs mtshan nyid ldan par ni //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-30: sngon du stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-31: de yi lus ni sbyang bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225a-32: sbyor bas bsgom pa'i lus can ni //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-0: dngos po med par bsgom @225b pa'i dngos //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-1: gang zhig dngos po rnam rtog pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-2: dngos por bsgom pa'i sa bon gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-3: stong pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-4: dgod bya'i yi ge rnam bkod pa //
