K12D0430_H0406:225b-6: dbyig pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-7: zhabs skyed phyag na rdo rje dang //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-8: lus ni dril bu 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-9: de bzhin mgo ni byams pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-10: me yi rnam pa steng 'bar ba //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-11: 'khor ba rnam par grol bar mdzad //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-13: kun nas stong pa'i dbus su bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-14: rnam shes ye shes sa bon gyis //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-15: dbus dang dbus su rnam par dkris //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-16: bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog brtson pas //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-17: rlung gi steng du bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-18: dang po dkar po kun nas bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-19: gnyis pa de bzhin ser po'o //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-20: gsum par gang zhig dmar po dang //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-21: bzhi pa la ni sngon po nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-22: mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-24: sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming zhes pa //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-25: gsang zhing gsang ba gsang chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-26: bdag gi gdan gyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:225b-27: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-28: tsha ba'i sa bon bye brag ni //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-29: lto ba'i thab khung 'di yi me //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-30: lto ba'i me ru shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-31: shar gyi cha ni dkar po'o //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-32: byang gi de bzhin ser po nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-33: nub kyi phyogs su dmar po ste //
K12D0430_H0406:225b-34: lho phyogs su ni nag por grags //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-0: dbus su mnyam pa'i kha dog @226a *//
K12D0430_H0406:226a-1: nyid; ;me lnga ru ni bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i ming zhes pa //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-3: shar gyi mer ni rab tu brtag /
K12D0430_H0406:226a-4: drag po mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-5: byang gi phyogs su rnam par brtag /
K12D0430_H0406:226a-6: ro langs ma zhes bshad pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-7: nub kyi phyogs su rab tu dgod //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-8: mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhes bya'i ming //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-9: lho phyogs kyi ni me yi ming //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-10: dbus su ye shes me 'di ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-11: ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya'i ming //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-12: padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-13: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-14: lag na rdo rje kha tv'am dang //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-16: gzugs ni mthe bo'i rnam pa tsam //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-17: khro bo'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-18: na li las ni yi ge brgyad //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-19: 'phyang ba po yi sgo ni thim //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-20: mkhas pas phyis ni bdag nyid ldas //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-21: gnas lnga ru ni sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-22: sems kyis dbugs ni rab bsdams nas //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-23: dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-24: gang zhig cung zad bza' btung rnams //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-25: sbyin sreg tu brtags bza' bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-26: dang po sgra yi yi ge dang //

K12D0430_H0406:226a-28: gsum pa glo ru re pha dang //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-29: bzhi pa'i steng du thig ler bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-30: lnga pa lteng du 'bar ba nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-31: sa bon lnga la bzlas shing bsreg /
K12D0430_H0406:226a-32: de ltar bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:226a-33: rgyas pa'i sbyor bar grags pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-0: sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dang @226b po'o ////

K12D0430_H0406:226b-4: yo ga shuddh'a:sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddhonyaham/
K12D0430_H0406:226b-5: de ltar spyod pa'i sbyor bas ni //

K12D0430_H0406:226b-7: thams cad kun nas stong nyid kyis //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-8: der ni chu 'di bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-9: kun nas chu yi gzugs dang ni //

K12D0430_H0406:226b-11: rgya chen yid la 'dod bzhin du //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-12: gser gyi grong khyer 'byung ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-13: rin chen bdun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-14: seng ge gdan gyi gdan gyi ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-16: dbus su ye shes bsam pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-17: ye shes mkha' 'gro'i ming nyid de //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-18: kha trv'am ga dang rnal 'byor snod //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-19: rab tu bzhad pas 'jigs par byed //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-20: na bza' dmar po gtsigs pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-21: dbu skra sil bu rab tu drag /
K12D0430_H0406:226b-22: ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya'i ming //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-23: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-24: ji skad gsungs pa'i phyi rol du //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-25: de yi gzugs kyi logs gnyis su //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-26: ji ltar phyogs kyi mdog nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-27: kun nas de yi phyag rgya rigs //

K12D0430_H0406:226b-29: rtag tu mchod dang gtor ma dbul //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-30: chu nya yi ni bdag nyid rnams //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-31: chu dang me dang de bzhin g-yo //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-32: ji ltar rlung du du ba bzung //
K12D0430_H0406:226b-33: ye shes rdo rjes dkris pa ni //

K12D0430_H0406:227a-1: wang gnyis ni m'a ma k'i //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-2: de yi gcig ni bdud rtsi'o //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-3: a'a li k'a li rab sbyor bas //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-4: gnyis kyi de nyid rab tu bya //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-5: a'a li zhes bya bung bar gsungs //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-6: k'a li de bzhin gshegs ma nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-7: ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-8: yi ge gsum pa gzung byas te //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-9: rdo rje yis ni dbyug pa nyid //

K12D0430_H0406:227a-11: rnal 'byor pa yis sdig pa gcod //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-12: padma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog /
K12D0430_H0406:227a-13: dri yi ngo bo shin tu snang mdzad dang //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-14: ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje'i phyag /
K12D0430_H0406:227a-15: lha gsum dag gi cho ga shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-16: ha zhes bya bas kha dog 'phrog /
K12D0430_H0406:227a-17: ho zhes bya bas dri med cing //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-19: rim pa 'di bzhin shes par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-20: thabs shes sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:227a-21: de nas gzhan yang gzhan gyi gdan //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-22: dang por re zhig mtshan nyid kyis; ;bdag nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:227a-23: ji ltar me yis thams cad mnyam par bsreg pa dang //

K12D0430_H0406:227b-0: chu yi @227b dbus su padma ni //

K12D0430_H0406:227b-8: dgod bya'i yi ge rnam par bkod //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-10: dbus su ye shes rnam shes ni //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-11: gzugs la yon tan dbang pos brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-12: dang po'i sgra yig dang po dang //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-13: de bzhin gnyis par nyis 'gyur nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-14: gsum la logs su re pha dang //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-15: bzhi pa'i steng du thig ler bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-16: phyogs kyi mdog tu dgod pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-18: mtshams su yi dvags gdan la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-19: ma ning yi ge bzhi pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-20: dbang ldan seng ge zhes bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-21: de bzhin me ru stag mo dang //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-22: bden bral 'ug pa h'um sgrogs pa //

K12D0430_H0406:227b-24: dbugs kyis dngos po thams cad dang //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-25: de yi phyag rgya'ang brtag par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-26: dngos pos dngos po bsgom pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-27: mkha' 'gro brgyad kyis rnam par bskor //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-28: logs su lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-29: dbus su'ang ye shes rnam par dgod //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-30: bdag nyid lus kyi lus can ni //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-31: gnyis med mchod pas mchod par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:227b-32: yid kyi me tog dkram pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-2: yid kyis byug pas mngon par byug /
K12D0430_H0406:228a-3: yid kyi mar me sbar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-4: sngon du rdzas ni lnga pa la //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-5: sangs rgyas lnga yis byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-6: sngon du gsungs pa'i bdud rtsi ni //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-7: dpa' bo'i lus la gzung bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-8: lcags kyus lha rnams thams cad ni //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-9: bdud rtsi'i yi ge tshim par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-10: a'a li k'a li rab sbyor las //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-11: dpa' bo'i dbus su byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-12: a'a lir shes pa m'a ma k'i //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-13: skyes bu rdo rje 'jigs byed do //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-14: lha mo g-yon pa la brten cing //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-15: skyes bu'i rkang pa h'um byas pa //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-16: de yi rdzas ni rab bstan pas //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-17: dpa' bos thams cad byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-18: bdag nyid lnga yi lus la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-19: mkha' 'gro lnga ni rnam par thim //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-20: 'dod la dga' nyid ma yin zhing longs spyod phyir yang brten mi bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-21: gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-22: dus kun tu ni mchod par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-23: gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:228a-24: de nas phyi yi gtor ma bshad //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-25: snying po'i gnas su mkha' 'gro ma //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-26: de bzhin byang du 'bar byed ma //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-27: 'jib byed ma ni nub tu gsungs //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-28: dag 'phrog lho phyogs rnal 'byor ma; ;rnal 'byor pho nya bzhi po ni //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-29: drag po'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-30: bdud rtsi lnga ni sbyin bya zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:228a-31: dam pa'i spyod pas mchod par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-0: mnyam nyid lte ba'i ye shes @228b kyis; ;mkhas pas gtor ma sbyin par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-2: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-3: mthe'u chung gnyis ni sprel byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-4: sdigs mdzub gnyis ni bsgreng byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-5: 'di ltar gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-7: ba dan gsum pa'i snying gar sbyin //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-8: steng du khu tshur thams cad bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-10: brgyad mtha' dang po'i sa bon dang //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-11: dgu yi mtha' ni byang du shar //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-12: shar dang nub kyi sa bon dang //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-13: lho yi gsum par mngon par gzung //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-14: pho nya bzhi yi sa bon 'di; ;sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-15: shar du bdud rtsi drag po yi //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-16: sa bon dbus su sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-17: ji ltar las la sogs sbyar ba //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-19: tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-20: smyung bar gnas pa'ang med pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-21: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-22: rtag tu 'bad pas mchog tu bsgrub //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-23: dam tshig la gnas dpa' bo che; ;'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs bcom //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-24: dag pa'i chos la dmigs pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-25: dag pa'i dbyangs ni lam po che //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-26: chos chen po ni legs par 'ongs //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-27: ro mchog mchog tu zhim pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-28: srid pa'i mgon po rgya che ba //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-29: sangs rgyas gang la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0430_H0406:228b-30: tshigs bcad 'di yis dbul bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-0: sbyor ba'i gdan gyi bdag nyid lha la @229a *//
K12D0430_H0406:229a-2: 'di nyid tshe la 'khor ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-3: tshigs bcad 'di yis blang bya zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-4: tshigs bcad 'di yis rab tu zed //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-5: padmar bsgyur ba'i gdan la ni //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-6: steng du rdo rje bstan par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-7: dbus su bdud rtsi ri rab kyis bsrubs nas //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-8: mthe mdzub gnyis ni sa yi steng du 'thor 'thung
K12D0430_H0406:229a-9: dbul; ;rgyas pa'i mchod rten lnga la ro yis lan
K12D0430_H0406:229a-10: lnga ru // bdud rtsi chu yis mchod rten dbus su bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-11: gzhan gyi gdan gyis bdag nyid dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:229a-12: gzhan yang gtor ma'i las bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-13: logs su gru gsum bya ba ni //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-14: khrag sogs gyis ni bya ba'am //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-15: g-yon pa khu tshur bcings byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-16: dbu ma khro bo brgyang bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-17: dbus ma yi ni gsum pa la //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-18: sdigs mdzub bkug la sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-19: du ba'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-26: kun nas gtor ma rdzogs byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-27: lnga pa'i rdzas kyis sbyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-28: aom shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-29: ri dang brag dang phug gi sa //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-30: yul gyi mdo dang lam dang zhing //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-31: khyad par du ni khyim stong nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:229a-32: shing chen shing gi bdag po dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-0: khyad @229b bar du ni chu mig nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-1: snod dang thang dang sa stong dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-2: khyad par sa steng gdol khyim gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-3: nag po drag po drag chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-4: lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-5: nag po gtsigs byed 'jigs byed pa //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-6: dga' las 'das pa bgegs rgyal po //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-7: rgan byed mo dang drag mo dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-8: 'jigs byed ma dang au mas bstod //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-9: rgyal mo rnam par rgyal mo dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-10: thub chen gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-11: nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-12: nag mo nag mo rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-13: dbang byed ma dang zla ba mo //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-14: drag mo sdang ba'i lam pa ki //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-15: 'phrog byed ma dang me mar ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-17: drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-18: mche ba gtsigs dang thod can ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-19: thod phreng thod pa'i phreng can ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-20: kha tv'am ga ma rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-21: ral gri dgra sta'i lag pa dang //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-22: rdo rje de bzhin gzhu lag ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-23: mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i de nyid che //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-24: las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-25: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen po //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-26: rdo rje dbang phyug de bzhin gtso //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen mo //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-28: gos med sbyor ba'i lha byed ma //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-29: rdo rje dbang phyug ma ka yis //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-33: sarba de ba lo ki ni na ka kka ka da ni /
K12D0430_H0406:229b-35: babba bandha [?] ni h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0430_H0406:229b-36: sha dang nya yis sbyar ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:229b-37: aom gyis spyan drangs gtor ma sbyin //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-0: ji ltar las la sogs brtsan @230a *//
K12D0430_H0406:230a-1: pa; ;bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-2: khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-4: nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-5: ye shes can gyi dpal 'dod pas //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-6: lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-7: aom hi li hi li badzr'i /
K12D0430_H0406:230a-8: ma tha ma tha yo gi n'i h'um dza:gzhan gyi
K12D0430_H0406:230a-9: gdan gyi le 'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o
K12D0430_H0406:230a-10: //// sngags kyi yi ge yi ge ni //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-11: yid kyis sprul bas bsgrub par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-12: snying po'i sems ni rnam spangs nas //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-13: nyams pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par bsgom //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-14: sngags ni dur dur zhes brjod pa //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-15: ae ma sems can nyon re mongs //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-16: des na yid la mngon 'dod pa'i //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-17: sngags kyi yi ge mchog nyid ni //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-18: 'gro ba rmongs pa'i de nyid med sngags dang //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-19: log par smra zhing gzugs brnyan sems dang bral //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-20: sngags kyi bdag nyid blo ldan gyis shes bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-21: las bzhi'i rnam par yongs su grags pa nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-22: skyes pa du ma'i gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-23: nas mthu'i mtshan nyid kun nas thams cad ni //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-24: g-yo zhing 'thab pa phra zhing gos pa med //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-25: sngags dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid mchog gi yi ge'o //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-26: gzugs la sogs pa kun 'jig pas //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-27: thams cad nam mkha'i bsgom pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:230a-28: khams drug dang ni dbang po drug /
K12D0430_H0406:230b-0: dbus ma'i khams nyid 'jig pa @230b dang; ;stong pa bco brgyad blo ldan gyis bsgom pa //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-1: sems can bsgom pa'i dngos po yis //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-3: shar du kha dog dkar po dang //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-4: byang phyogs su ni ser po'o //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-6: lho phyogs su ni sngon po nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-7: dbus su mnyam pa'i gnas su yang //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-8: mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-9: a'a li k'a lir rab sbyor pa; ;de yi sa bon dbyung bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-10: nam mkha'i dbus ni mchog nyid du //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-11: gang zhig dbus su zla ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-12: zla ba'i dbus su sa bon ni //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-14: tshon sna bdun ni sna tshogs pa //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-16: gong du bla ma'i yi ge dang //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-17: tha ma bsreg pa'i yi ge dang //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-18: dbus su sa bon gzhag byas pa //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-19: mnyam gzhag bzlas su 'ong ba yis //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-20: 'bum phrag gsum du mkhas pas bzla //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-21: sbyor ba'i gdan las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
K12D0430_H0406:230b-22: phyin pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba le'u dang po'o
K12D0430_H0406:230b-23: //// sngon gsungs mtshan nyid dang ldan pas //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-24: sngon bshad stong pa nyid kyi gzhi //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-25: ye shes can gyis mnyam gzhag pas //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-26: gzugs la sogs pa gzhig par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-27: kun nas stong pa'i dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-28: mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-30: 'od zer kun nas yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:230b-31: phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun tu //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-2: thig le thig le phra ba'i gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-4: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-6: me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-8: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya; ;de dbus ji skad gsungs pa yi //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-10: rnam shes ye shes sems dpa' 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-11: spyi bor thams cad bsam pa 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-12: yi ge yi ge steng du bcas //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-13: smra ba'i sa bon thams cad ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-14: de ni rgyal po zhes su brjod //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-15: ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbyibs //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-16: rlung gi dbus su btung bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-17: sa bon de yi sbyar bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-18: sgra ni steng dang steng du 'o //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-19: de ltar sa bon mchog bsam pa //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-20: ye shes rnam shes ming nyid do //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-22: zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-23: bdun pa'i mtha' ni yang dag blang //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-24: gang gis bdud rtsi sa bon bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-25: gang zhig bzlas pas dkris pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-26: kha dog dkar por bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-27: sgra yig dang po blang byas la //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-28: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa'o //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-29: dgu mtha'i sa bon yi ge ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-30: logs su me yis spyar bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-31: gzhan du rlung gi sa bon dang //
K12D0430_H0406:231a-32: rlung gi ngos su mngon par bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-0: thams cad kun nas bsgom pa @231b ni; ;ye shes thig le zhes bya'i ming //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-1: sdig byed blun po'i sems can rnams //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-2: sbyor ba 'di yis dag par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-3: sa bon las ni rdo rje bskyed //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-4: de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshan nyid shes; ;dbus su rnam par snang mdzad lus //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-5: rab tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-6: 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-7: ting 'dzin kun nas yang dag gnas //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-8: dbus su 'di gzugs bsam par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-10: mgrin par re pha'i thig le dang //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-11: bsgrub bya'i mdun du bsgom bya ba //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-12: lan bdun pa yis 'byed pa ni //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-13: mnga' yi rtse mor sa bon bsam //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-14: kha dog dkar po ka sha bzhin //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-15: mnga' 'dren pa yis dbyig pa yis //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-16: sngags pas sa bon bzlas par bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-17: phyag rgya'i rnam pa bcing ba dang //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-18: sa bon sems kyis bzla bar bya //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-20: de bzhin myur du mngon par 'gugs //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-21: yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-22: rtsa bar nga ro sbyar bar bya; ;de ni bdud rtsi yid 'ong ming //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-24: 'byung po bzhin du dri za dang //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-25: mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma bshad pa //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-26: gnod sbyin yi dvags grul bum dang //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-27: rdo rje lha mo rnal 'byor ma /
K12D0430_H0406:231b-28: gal te 'dod na phran tshegs mi //
K12D0430_H0406:231b-29: sbyor bas myur du 'gugs par byed //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-1: tu rmongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0430_H0406:232a-2: gzugs kun zad par byas nas ni //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-3: gzugs ni mi gnas zad par 'gyur //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-4: skar ma'i rnam pa'i dbyibs su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-5: dang por stong pa mngon bsam bya //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-6: mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed byas nas //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-7: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-8: dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-9: gu gul phyag na rdo rje dang //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-10: yan lag 'jam dbyangs dril bu mchog /
K12D0430_H0406:232a-11: byams pa zla ba'i ri mo nyid //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-12: ma zhes bya ba steng 'bar ba //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-13: rnam par 'khor ba sgrol bar mdzad //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang //
K12D0430_H0406:232a-17: lha nyid lnga ni bsgom par bya //
